titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an George Edward Moore, 21. 11. [1946 ?]
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Original bei Timothy Moore; Kopie im BA. Publiziert (deutsch: Briefe, S. 224).

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: I'm afraid I find that I have to go to London this morning on urgent business; so I won't be able to see you this afternoon. I'm very sorry. Perhaps you'll allow me to see you today week?
I'm sorry I wasn't able to notify you sooner.
